channel.title: Typescript on Çağatay Türkan
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on Çağatay Türkan

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 9: Sample Project
item.description: In this article, we will explore the process of developing a Todo application using TypeScript and Node.js with JWT and Google OAuth authentication. We will discuss the experience of designing a modern REST API by implementing TypeScript’s type safety, MongoDB integration, and clean architecture principles.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 8: Type Narrowing
item.description: In this article, we’ll explore type narrowing techniques in TypeScript. We’ll cover type checking methods like typeof, instanceof, type predicates, and discriminated unions.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 7: Generics
item.description: In this article, we’ll explore generics, one of TypeScript’s most powerful features. We’ll learn how to write reusable code while maintaining type safety.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 6: Classes
item.description: In this article, we will examine TypeScript’s class structure in detail. We will cover topics such as class definitions, access modifiers, getter/setter methods, and abstract classes.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 5: The TypeScript Compiler
item.description: In this article, we will examine the TypeScript compiler in detail. We will learn how to manage compiler settings, configuration options, and project configuration.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 4: Interfaces
item.description: In this article, we will examine interfaces, one of the important features of TypeScript, in detail. We will understand their differences from Type Aliases and learn practical use cases.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 3: Object Types
item.description: In this article, we will explore object types in TypeScript in detail. We will learn about object definitions, type aliases, and working with nested objects.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 2: Functions
item.description: In this article, we’ll explore TypeScript functions in detail, covering parameter types, return types, and special function types that make TypeScript unique and powerful.

item.title: Understanding TypeScript - Part 1: The Basics
item.description: TypeScript is a powerful superset of JavaScript that adds static typing to the language. In this article series, we’ll explore TypeScript from basics to advanced concepts, starting with fundamental types and type inference.
